results.title: We are the People
results.brief_description: The choir brings together Akala, PGR, Beardyman, Wretch 32, Ms Dynamite and Lady Leshurr with members of the YouTube community who uploaded performances to the YouTube channel. Together they perform an original track made by the human voice.
